# **mrgsolve Vignettes**

mrgsolve is an R package for simulation from hierarchical, ordinary differential 
equation (ODE) based models typically employed in drug development.

This website contains (hopefully) helpful vignettes to help you learn and 
use mrgsolve to get your simulation work done.  


# **Other Resources**

See also:

- The main mrgsolve help page: https://mrgsolve.github.io
- The user guide: https://mrgsolve.github.io/user_guide
- Issue tracker for asking questions or reporting bugs: 
  https://github.com/metrumresearchgroup/mrgsolve/issues
